name: HappyBabyExperts
0:
”Alexa, ask Happy Baby Experts to give me tips on low milk supply?”
”Alexa, ask Happy Baby Experts to tell me more about mastitis?”
”Alexa, ask Happy Baby Experts if I can breastfeed after a glass of wine?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: happy baby experts
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Happy Baby Experts Skill offers parents infant feeding and nutrition support when they need it most – 24/7!
Developed with an in-house team of lactation consultants and registered dietitian nutritionists, this skill offers answers to parents top questions, including help with latching or decreased milk supply, assisting with formula measurements, advising on how to start solids, defining popular infant feeding terms, and more.

Enable Skill by saying “ALEXA, open Happy Baby Experts.”
You will hear a prompt- listen and then ask your question!


If you are not getting the information you are looking for, you can say “ALEXA, Cancel” and you will be re-prompted to ask another question. 

You can say “ALEXA, Help” if you would like more detailed directions on how to interact with the Skill
You can ask questions or inquire about definitions of lactation or infant feeding related topics, similar to what you’d discuss with a Lactation Consultant or Registered Dietitian Nutritionist. 

Some of the Topics Covered in This Skill:
- Help with Milk supply
- Feeding frequency tips
- Latching tips
- Pumping tips
- Milk storing tips
- What to eat while breastfeeding
- How and when to start solids
- Formula questions (i.e. measurements, what to do while traveling, etc.)
- Effects of substances/conditions related to breastfeeding (i.e. medications, alcohol, etc.)
- Normal and abnormal behaviors/conditions from baby
- Sleep concerns 
- Defining common nursing/infant feeding terms (i.e. mastitis, cluster feeding, etc.)

Sample listing of questions you can ask… 
Ask Happy Baby Experts for tips on lactation and nursing topics 
- "Help me with ..." 
- "Tell me about…" 
- "Explain…." 
- "Give me tips on…" 

Ask Happy Baby Experts for definitions of nursing terms 
- "Definition of…" 
- "What are…" 
- "What's …" 

Ask Happy Baby Experts common questions 
- "Can I breastfeed if…" 
- "How do I…" 
- "Should I…" 
- "Is it safe to…" 
- "Why…"

Support from Happy Baby Experts is not a substitute for medical advice from your doctor. If you have or suspect that you have a medical problem or condition, please contact your pediatrician or a doctor immediately. We provide basic lactation information; a consultation with an IBCLC is always recommended for complex or urgent breast-feeding issues. By using this Skill, you understand and agree to the Happy Family Privacy Policy.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
